messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/1/2003 7:36:18 PM Mountain Daylight Time, ... Hello, I am new to this list, my two oldest girls are 7 and 6, they are still in public
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/1/2003 7:36:18 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
kellibac@... writes:


> my_anna_bell <annabell1972@...> wrote:Hello Everybody!
> My daughters and I were going through my old stamp collection I
> happened to come across at my mothers. I was telling them about my
> penpals from Japan and China I once had as a child. It got us to
> thinking...would anyone like to be an "old fashioned penpal?" aka
> snail mail.
> My daughters are 10 and 7. Too many interest to really list. The
> basics...LOVE art, reading & writing, anything outdoors, computers
> and did I mention ART?! That's very big in our house.
> If anyone is interested please contact us at our email address and we
> can exchange addresses. Be sure to place *PenPals* in the subject
> line to avoid being deleted by mistake.
> **Mom's & Dad's....this is open to you as well if you would like to
> write also. I love to write letters just as much as I like to receive
> them. It's nice to find a friendly letter amoungst all the bills!
> *grin*. I enjoy meeting new people and learning from their lives.
> Excited to meet people from all over the world. I love playing games
> with our children. Working with Stained Glass, Clay, Copper and all
> other art forms. I love photography and scrapbooking. I would love to
> learn about stamping. Love reading, writing and anything involving
> nature for the most part. I love traveling, just can't afford to do
> it as often as I would like. I enjoy working with our children as we
> find and sell items on ebay. It has been such fun. check us
> out...ebay seller name: online_annie
> I hope to hear from you! You can write just about anything*, day to
> day thoughts or experiences, life in general. (*except religion.
> Sorry, not a religious person.)
> ~Annie
>
>

Hello,
I am new to this list, my two oldest girls are 7 and 6, they are still in
public school, only for the fact that my dh wants them to finish out the
year. Only four weeks left. Needless to say, they will not be returning in
the fall. My youngest daughter is 3 1/2 and her brother is 1 1/2. I know my
7 year old just LOVES to write letters... to anyone she can... so please let
me know your address or email me off list and I can send you ours. My girls
would love to have someone to write to besides their grandparents! Thanks!
Michelle
Proud Mom of:
Emily-7
Cassidy-5
Maria Rose-3
Ethan-1 1/2
&
"Angel" Kyle John
3/3/95-3/12/95




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....
messages.msgSnippet: Oh that sounds WONDERFUL!!!!!  I might just have to take you up on that!! Kristen ... From: The Clifton s To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Friday,
messages.messageBody:
Oh that sounds WONDERFUL!!!!! I might just have to take you up on that!!

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: The Clifton's
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, May 02, 2003 10:32 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....


My 10 yr. old daughter would like to be a penpal. We live in Okinawa. Email us at rpclif14@...

Also, if anyone wants to visit Okinawa, all you have to do is come up with the airfare (it's not cheap though) and you have a free place to stay. We would love to show anyone this beautiful island.

Dina
----- Original Message -----
From: my_anna_bell
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, May 02, 2003 01:44
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....


Hello Everybody!
My daughters and I were going through my old stamp collection I
happened to come across at my mothers. I was telling them about my
penpals from Japan and China I once had as a child. It got us to
thinking...would anyone like to be an "old fashioned penpal?" aka
snail mail.
My daughters are 10 and 7. Too many interest to really list. The
basics...LOVE art, reading & writing, anything outdoors, computers
and did I mention ART?! That's very big in our house.
If anyone is interested please contact us at our email address and we
can exchange addresses. Be sure to place *PenPals* in the subject
line to avoid being deleted by mistake.
**Mom's & Dad's....this is open to you as well if you would like to
write also. I love to write letters just as much as I like to receive
them. It's nice to find a friendly letter amoungst all the bills!
*grin*. I enjoy meeting new people and learning from their lives.
Excited to meet people from all over the world. I love playing games
with our children. Working with Stained Glass, Clay, Copper and all
other art forms. I love photography and scrapbooking. I would love to
learn about stamping. Love reading, writing and anything involving
nature for the most part. I love traveling, just can't afford to do
it as often as I would like. I enjoy working with our children as we
find and sell items on ebay. It has been such fun. check us
out...ebay seller name: online_annie
I hope to hear from you! You can write just about anything*, day to
day thoughts or experiences, life in general. (*except religion.
Sorry, not a religious person.)
~Annie


Yahoo! Groups Sponsor





~~~~ Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject line! ~~~~

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....
messages.msgSnippet: My 11 year old daughter would like to be a pen pal! Email me offlist for details:  litlrooh@comcast.net Kristen ... From: Backstrom kelli To:
messages.messageBody:
My 11 year old daughter would like to be a pen pal!

Email me offlist for details: litlrooh@...

Kristen
----- Original Message -----
From: Backstrom kelli
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, May 01, 2003 9:35 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] **Wanted** Snail Mail Penpals....


Hi! My ten year old dd has been looking and looking for a pen pal! I am so glad for the idea! Please let us know your address or we can let you know ours off the list and we can begin. She is a really neat kid, loves to read, art, baseball and it hysterically funny. Look forward to hearing from you! Kelli and Molly Backstrom

If anyone is interested please contact us at our email address and we
can exchange addresses. Be sure to place *PenPals* in the subject

**Mom's & Dad's....this is open to you as well if you would like to
write also. I love to write letters just as much as I like to receive
them. It's nice to find a friendly letter amoungst all the bills!
*grin*. I enjoy meeting new people and learning from their lives.
Excited to meet people from all over the world. I love playing games
with our children. Working with Stained Glass, Clay, Copper and all
